snippet.title: UFO Taxi - Official trailer #1
snippet.description:
UFO Taxi is a 2.5D casual platformer indie video game. 
Steam page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2886240/UFO_Taxi/ 👽

Stranded on a futuristic Earth, you and your alien pals need cash to get home! Explore a vibrant 2.5D world, tackle zany taxi missions, and assist quirky characters in this casual platformer. Can you hustle your way to a stellar escape?

0:00 - Story Introduction
0:30 - Activities in the Game
1:32 - Outro

Music: "Electronic Grudge" provided by Ovani Sound

#indie #indiegame #videogames #videogame #trailer #casualgames #alien #aliens
